trans-unit.source: An instance of VoiceChangeEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event.
trans-unit.target: En instans av VoiceChangeEventArgs skapas när den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt aktiverar den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the identity of the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta identiteten för den nya <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, åtkomst till den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>egenskap i hanteraren för händelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice in use by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra röst används av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>med någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>metoder eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo"></xref> object of the new voice.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo"> </xref> objekt av den nya rösten.

trans-unit.source: The Voice property gets the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Röst egenskapen hämtar den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>objekt när en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information that describes and identifies the new voice.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar information som beskriver och identifierar den nya rösten.
